name: Nils Hagberg's NEW Minesweeper 5 DELUXE by Nils Hagberg
name_original: Nils Hagberg's NEW Minesweeper 5 DELUXE by Nils Hagberg
description:
NEW from Nils Hagberg comes Nils Hagberg's NEW Minesweeper 5 DELUXE by Nils Hagberg, an amazing, inspiring and unthinkable take on the classic Minesweeper formula. 

  • Gameplay, randomly generated levels creates up to infinite replayability options.
  • Roguelike gameplay, permadeath, minimalist design, turn-based, randomness.
  • The story, follow the story of a minesweeper in Laos during and after American aeroplanes dropped cluster bombs over civilians during the Vietnam war.
  • Immersion, fully realized settings and environments.
